website_summaries.verdict: This corn-based pasta gives you the lighter look and taste of a yellow pasta without the gluten.
pros: These noodles are less likely to turn mushy than some other gluten-free options
Pasta is also vegan and non-GMO
One of the closest in texture to wheat pasta
cons: Obviously not a good choice if you're avoiding corn
also tends to break up if you overcook it

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten Free noodles sold
customer_reviews.text: Living Gluten free , I have no choice but to find and experience new GF products. Most GF is well , bad. We have tried at least 15 different GF noodles and these are by far the # 1 GF noodle of choice . Most GF noodles turn to mush minutes after you cook them . These hold there form and keep their shape . If you have to eat Gluten Free like me , Try these, you will not regret buying them.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Small portions, great taste.
customer_reviews.text: The packs are kind of small if you're cooking for more than 2, especially for the price. That being said, the quality and taste has been far beyond any other brand of corn pasta I have found. Great texture and taste, barely a difference over traditional pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent GF pasta
customer_reviews.text: Hard to tell this gluten free pasta from regular wheat pasta. It tastes the same, has excellent consistency. Holds up just like regular pasta, not mushy or starchy like other gluten free pastas. I really like the diversity of the offerings available, too. (I got the variety pack) I can highly recommend this pasta!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: people with gluten allergies can choose this noodle.
customer_reviews.text: This noodle is hard to cook. it takes a long time to cook, the process of cooking also need to keep stirring, otherwise it will stick together, there is no taste, but its ingredients are gluten free, so it is suitable for people with allergies to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Best GF pasta I’ve tried
customer_reviews.text: Best pasta and I’ve tried many. For me, I cook longer than recommended as I don’t like chewy pasta. I would try the variety pack first. More expensive but I’m Celiac and my diet is so restricted, I’d rather pay extra for something I like. People enjoy different brands but I do recommend trying this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten free pasta I've tried
customer_reviews.text: This brand makes amazing gluten-free pasta. I can not tell the difference between this and regular semolina pasta. The pasta doesn't break down as almost all GF pasta does, the texture is right, as well as the flavor. It's the only GF pasta I'll buy now. I've tried their fettuccine, angel hair, ditalini, and spaghetti. They are all wonderful! I just wish it wasn't so pricey but I'll live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste. I made lasagna (with the no cook or no boil lasagna) for myself (I,m Gluten Free) and my husband. It was delicious. My husband loved and couldn't tell I used GF pasta. I ordered LeVeneziane because when I first tried the spaghetti it didn't taste GF. The taste was like the pasta I remembered as a child. I am referring this brand to everyone I know who likes pasta and wants to eat healthy. Thank you LeVeneziane!
customer_reviews.author: molson

customer_reviews.title: Top pick for gluten free pasta
customer_reviews.text: These is my favorite gluten free pasta brand! They are 100 perfect corn (while many other brands of gluten free pasta are made with a mix of rice and corn). I find these corn pasta hold their shape well when cooked and don’t fall apart or go mushy while the ones with rice don’t cook as well. I like that this product had no dyes (the yellow color is natural cones from the corn that’s used to make the product). Made in Italy.
customer_reviews.author: Tori P. :star:

customer_reviews.title: Just Yum
customer_reviews.text: Being celiac shouldn't be a sentence of meal isolation and food you have to convince yourself is good enough to continue eating. The fact that I don't feel like people are doing me a favor to eat a meal with me I prepared, is more than words. It really is great you guys. Worth the experiment. Not super large portions. One package will feed me and one other person if we both came to dinner hungry and I included a little salad or side item. Usually just a touch left over for a small lunch the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Corn Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Very good corn pasta. I've used a different brand for years which Amazon has not been selling as much of late. Tried this and love it, better than other brand. Only problem is that the other brand I used had more pasta in it per package. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent years trying gluten free pasta's, but no more! The water is perfectly clear, the taste and texture are just right, with no lingering after taste, and after weeks of eating it, I don't sick of it, like I did every other brand. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great Gluten Free Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Great gluten free pasta but it definitely requires less cooking than you originally think! I highly recommend tossing it with a little bit of butter after finishing cooking as it helps retain it's moisture and shape without getting destroyed when you start mixing a sauce in or other components.
customer_reviews.author: Lazar Trifunovic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pasta
customer_reviews.text: When my husband had to go gluten free, I tried so many gluten-free pastas and none of them were satisfactory. Both the flavor and consistency left a lot of be desired. About a year ago I discovered La Veneziane and the search was over. Whether with an Italian-style sauce, in a casserole, or penne and cheese (like mac and cheese), it is perfect every time. This week I made a Greek pasta salad: spirals, chicken, cucumber, kalamata olives, beets, red onion, feta, celery, dressed with Greek yogurt blended into a vinaigrette. It was quite fabulous. I would use La Veneziane even if cooking for guests who were not sensitive to gluten.
customer_reviews.author: Gale Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best GF pasta!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely the best gluten free pasta I've ever had! It has a great texture & flavor, stays together well!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Triplett

customer_reviews.title: delicious GF pasta!
customer_reviews.text: i'm on a low FODMAP food elimination diet and read a recommendation for this brand on an IBS/low FODMAP blog. it's amazing! i made low FODMAP spaghetti bolognese last night and it's the first low FODMAP meal i've had where i didn't feel like i was missing out on anything, it was delicious, and kept me full. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: price + cotter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent GF Pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent GF pasta that does not fall apart, and is not sticky. It tastes great, and my family is incredibly picky about pasta. You could easily serve this to non GF people, and they'd never know. Great consistency, like non GF pasta, but it's safe for those of us with Celiac disease.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Musical Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pasta
customer_reviews.text: My husband is gluten intolerant so if I don't want to cook two pastas I have to eat gluten free, this is absolutely fantastic pasta. We've tried alot of brands and this is definitely the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anita B.

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta! High cost!
customer_reviews.text: The best gluten free noodles. I cannot tell the difference in test or texture to regular pasta. I would serve Le Veneziane pasta to all my family and guest but the price does not allow for that, I always have to make two different pots of pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Yea, a pasta I'm NOT allergic to!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pasta is exactly as described. I am super glad that I found it for sale here. I will be buying more of this and more often. I cannot tell the difference between this and regular pasta, except that I have NOT had any allergic reactions to this pasta. Thanks for making this available.
customer_reviews.author: J . SON

customer_reviews.title: They are great quality pasta
customer_reviews.text: This pasta cooks up great and taste delicious! I like this pasta better than Barilla and better than Ronzoni gluten free pastas!
customer_reviews.author: genveve

customer_reviews.title: Great taste for gluten free
customer_reviews.text: My son in law eats gluten free and he loves this product. I tried it and couldn’t tell the difference. Would recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten free pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely. Delicious! Tastes even better then regular pasta, as it’s slightly sweet because it’s made of corn! Cook exactly as instructed on package and even if you overcook a bit, it’s still fine. It’s my go-to pasta! I wish I could buy more at one time - the quantities seem to be limited. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Trinity3710

customer_reviews.title: I've had better.
customer_reviews.text: I've had corn pasta cheaper and more flavorful than this. Gave it a try, but wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: By far and away- THE BEST gf pasta. In fact, it’s really good pasta period. The other reviews were so accurate. It’s really good.
customer_reviews.author: Zooweemama

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A good gluten free pasta!
customer_reviews.text: After having tried several gluten free pastas out there, this one is by far the best one i have had. Yes it's pricey and yes the packages are little more than half a pound (great for 2 to 3 people) but sometimes we do have to choose taste over price. I love my pasta and I am glad I finally found one that doesn't taste any different than "regular" pasta. I recommend it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Treglio

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor and texture
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite gluten free pasta in terms of both flavor and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T-M

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the best GF pasta I've ever had.I have tried many brands but this the best out there!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many brands of gluten free pasta. This brand will fool everyone. It is so tasty and closest to regular pasta. Even my son-in-law was surprised at how good it was
customer_reviews.author: Dwadesworld

customer_reviews.title: BEST GLUTEN FREE PASTA EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten free pasta I’ve ever had!!! We have tried all the varieties in the assortment they are all delicious 😋
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste
customer_reviews.text: The flavor and texture of this gluten free pasta is great! Love it and it's hard to tell that they're gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten Free On The Market
customer_reviews.text: Recently had to go gluten free and being a pasta-holic, I hated having to give up pasta. You will never notice the difference with this. Tastes great. It is expensive, but what isn't when you're gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: A comment if I could

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: It is corn based. I liked the taste and texture. So I am a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lp

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: This pasta tastes like regular pasta, love it! Looking for one this good that is organic....
customer_reviews.author: scoobey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This gluten free pasta is the best brand I’ve purchased and I’ve tried many!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Turner

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten free pasta I have eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eiler

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely DELICIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST gluten free pasta!!! I’m Italian and have tried all kinds of gluten free pastas this taste like the “real” thing... I honestly cannot tell that it’s gluten-free. You will not be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Used this pasta for a dinner with a friend who is gluten intolerant and was surprised to find that the flavor and texture were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleasantly surprised by the flavor and texture. I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Madden's mama

customer_reviews.title: Corn Pasta from Italy
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best corn pasta I have ever used. The flavor is excellent, it cooks well. I use the time noted on the package and it cooks perfectly. When reheating I add a little bit of water and microwave to warm. I am so very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: so for those of you who are gluten free and have been searching for a great tasting wide fettuccine noodle
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so for those of you who are gluten free and have been searching for a great tasting wide fettuccine noodle....Stop searching because you have found them. I just love this brand, and I have tried many. Just a tip, do not overcook, make sure it is al dente otherwise they will break in small pieces. There are also small ridges in noodle that adds a small amount of texture and really allows sauce to adhere. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pasta
customer_reviews.text: When you are gluten free it is nice to find a food that is good tasting.
customer_reviews.author: T. Worthen

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice flavor. I have a friend with celiac, and if he came for dinner I would cook this for everyone, not just a private portion for him. Cooks to al dente, and doesn't get mushy if you cook a little more. When leftover cold, it's a little crunchy/crumbly but reheating restores its texture.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher James

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten free pasta on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had celiac disease for 20+ years and in all that time this is the best gluten free pasta I’ve had. We have served tot to company and no one noticed it was not wheat pasta. We never use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: W. Berman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: The is BY FAR the BEST gluten free pasta you will ever ingest. Flavor and texture is spot on to gluten "filled" pasta. I didn't believe the other reviews so I had to try it for myself. Please don't ever stop selling this pasta! I'll be ordering more immediately!
customer_reviews.author: Organic Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pasta!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten free pasta on the market!! If you are celiac, gluten intolerant or gluten free by choice, try this pasta. You will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs L

customer_reviews.title: Maybe better than the wheat...been too long for conparison
customer_reviews.text: Maybe even better than the wheat version. Was a nice surprise to some of the other "gluten-free" pasta that we have tried to eat. Nice and fresh tasting and a good "tooth feel"....
customer_reviews.author: Debra Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: First time I got was great!! But this last time the taste was really bad! And smelled really strong! Definitely I’m not going to get again. Was waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Tuna noodle casserole! I’m GF intolerant. Finally found the perfect pasta both of us will eat for this casserole. Delicious. It is now my pasta of choice! Use Amy’s Mushroom Bisque as the soup!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Regas

customer_reviews.title: Zero points on WW
customer_reviews.text: Love this and the flavor is excellent. Just wish it cost less.
customer_reviews.author: Bugzee3

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten free pasta
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other gluten free pastas this one tasted the best.
customer_reviews.author: Les Gallo-Silver

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten free pasta
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting gluten free pasta! I have tried several other brands of gluten free pasta and this was the best one so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Jones

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to try this pasta and it was even better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with all grains except corn. I was so excited to try this pasta and it was even better than anticipated. Thank you for making this great product.
customer_reviews.author: CHEF_nato

customer_reviews.title: this pasta is excellent and allows us to follow our Paleo guidelines
customer_reviews.text: Although gluten-free, this pasta is excellent and allows us to follow our Paleo guidelines. The texture is superior to regular pasta, it remains unclumped, even if it must wait a bit for the sauce, and its al dente quality is marvelous. I am looking forward to trying more of the shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah W. Seigman

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, kids love it
customer_reviews.text: We don’t eat wheat and this is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: mdnyc

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like regular pasta
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am on WW and I cannot stand whole wheat pasta. This pasta tastes like regular pasta. If I didn't know what I was eating I would have never guessed that it wasn't regular pasta! It a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten Free Pasta out there
customer_reviews.text: Le Veneziane Gluten Free Pasta is the best gf pasta around. Have been using it for years. Comes from Italy so that should tell you something. Try it!!!
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Le Veneziane is my favorite gluten free pasta
customer_reviews.text: Le Veneziane is my favorite gluten free pasta. It does not taste gluten free at all. This variety pack is a great value compared to buying Le Veneziane from other places.
customer_reviews.author: the7dwarfsandme

customer_reviews.title: Taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: Hands down best gluten free pasta I’ve ever had. Taste like you made it from scratch. Will always keep several boxes on hand.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful taste!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting gluten free pasta I have ever purchased. I will only buy this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Sharron howell

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great !
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this pasta for several years and was very pleased to be able to order it from Amazon ! It is without a doubt the best Gluten Free pasta in the market ! My French Husband even says it’s as good as wheat pasta! Our Daughter has Celiac and she buys it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ducloz

customer_reviews.title: Best pasta if you can’t have wheat
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pasta if you can’t have wheat. Does not get mushy like rice pasta. Stays al dente. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer slm

customer_reviews.title: texture
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten free noodles! I have tried many brands and none compare to this one! The noodles do not turn hard if you reheat them. No one would know they are gluten free. Package instruction are perfect and if you follow them, you will be happy with the product. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Czerw

customer_reviews.title: Pasta is back at our house!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. We finally found GF pasta that tastes great and does not fall apart!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great gluten free product
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find corn made gluten free products. This pasta is made with corn which in my opinion tastes better than rice made pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Garstka

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tasting gluten free pastas I have eaten
customer_reviews.text: One of the best tasting gluten free pastas I have eaten . I will be buying it again . Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Steward

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The fettuccine was fabulous! Best gluten free pasta I’ve tried.. it’s worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: jane e boots

customer_reviews.title: It's the best
customer_reviews.text: This gluten free pasta is expensive but worth every penny. The best gluten free pasta available.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M. Dicioccio

customer_reviews.title: Good pasta
customer_reviews.text: I had this pasta at a restaurant and it was very good. They also sold packages of it and I bought one from the restaurant but it was almost $7 a box. I found it on Amazon at this price and ordered a pack of 4 different pastas, love it. Pasta is one of the things I miss the most since eating GF and this is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S Arney

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I was happily surprised with the taste. A bit sticky but nevertheless good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Marson

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love,love,love this pasta.It did not fall apart when reheating.The taste was great also.Will forever buy this product.Just wish it was a little cheaper..

customer_reviews.title: macaroni salad
customer_reviews.text: they were good hot, but didn't care for in a cold macaroni salad. especially the next day after refrigeration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been on the hunt for great pasta. All the other pasta I’ve tried have ...
customer_reviews.text: Since being diagnosed with celiac disease about four years ago, I’ve been on the hunt for great pasta. All the other pasta I’ve tried have been crumbly after cooking, many with a strong flavor (corn especially). This pasta has the consistency of what I’ve been looking for and fantastic flavor. Will definitely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste/texture
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta 🎉 First had it at a restaurant near my home and asked what kind of pasta they used. I got on Amazon's website and immediately ordered it. Cooked some up as soon as my package arrived!! Can't say enough good thongs about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia A. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and easy order.
customer_reviews.text: Best GF pasta my family of 5 eaters have ever had. Best is like egg noodle and no boil lasagna noodle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like regular gluten pasta!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best gluten free pasta I found! The price is a little too high but that’s gluten free food.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I’ve never liked a gluten free pasta until now! I wish they came in family sized packages.
customer_reviews.author: panamamama

customer_reviews.title: Best gluten free pasta on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best glut free pasta on the market, by far! I tried them in Italy and I was very happy to find them in the States.
customer_reviews.author: Luca R.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife; she says it’s the best tasting gluten free pasta she’s had (been eating GF for 10 years and have tried every variety we see) ...and just reordered it
customer_reviews.author: UFC3

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I tried several gluten free pastas before finding Le Veneziane. Purchasing on Amazon makes it easy to make a variety of pasta dishes.

customer_reviews.title: Gluten free
customer_reviews.text: Tastes very much like traditional pasta . Cooks al dente and holds up well in sauces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a find for me. This is a great pasta that am so happy that I purchased, finally a gluten free pasta that's really delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss

customer_reviews.title: Good texture
customer_reviews.text: Best gf pasta I have tried, and I’ve tried a lot! A little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Madeline  DeForge

customer_reviews.title: The best I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best dry gluten free pasta I have ever had. This product is well worth the extra expense. It behaves more like traditional pasta than any other GF product I have tried. There is no aftertaste and once cooked the pasta has a nice elasticity unlike the other, often brittle, products I have had.

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This is really good gluten free pasta. The kind I buy locally required that you rinse it off after it is cooked, which was a real pain. No need to do that here. I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Lindekugel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT pasta and impossible to tell it is GF
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten free pasta out there. You can truly not tell that this isn’t just regular pasta. Cooks to al dente perfection and tastes great with any sauce. I am super picky with textures and can usually notice a difference instantly but this is foolproof. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: EMNGGN

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot tell the difference in taste or texture, compared to glutenous pasta.

customer_reviews.title: gf pasta
customer_reviews.text: This tastes very similar to regular pasta. I was very impressed.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this corn pasta to everyone
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy this pasta at a local gluten free store. The store since then has closed to do business online. I recommend this corn pasta to everyone. It is delicious tasting and not heavy like other pastas.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Very good for gluten free pasta..kinda pricey..but you get what you pay for.

customer_reviews.title: You can't tell it's not the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every other kind of GF pasta, and this is hands down the best. If you didn't already know it was GF, you would never guess. (My 3 kids had no clue!) It has the taste, texture, and indulgent feel of traditional pasta. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... pasta for some time and have not been real happy with the pasta on the second day
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating Quinoa pasta for some time and have not been real happy with the pasta on the second day. I do like this brand of pasta. Heats up nicely in leftovers.

customer_reviews.text: Good brand. You can't beat the consistency of corn pasta and this is a family favorite to make mac-n-cheese for our kids.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting gluten free pasta!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific gluten free pasta, probably the best I've had. It tastes just as good as regular pasta. I will definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Battistelli

customer_reviews.title: This is BY FAR the best gluten free pasta out there
customer_reviews.text: This is BY FAR the best gluten free pasta out there.....Truly you can not even tell this difference between this and the regular white pasta. We like it with a little EVOO and sea salt and it tastes great! and retains its shape with leftovers too!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I had corn pasta in Italy which ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I had corn pasta in Italy which were great. However I have had some good and some are bad. This was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best Gluten-Free Pasta
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend has Celiac and so I am constantly on the hunt for gluten-free products. Speaking with no exaggeration, this is the best gluten-free packaged pasta we’ve ever eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gf pasta
customer_reviews.text: We are gluten free and this is really good pasta!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: It is the best gluten free pasta!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gluten free pasta that I have found. An italian chef in Batavia, Illinois was the first person to recommend it to me. He sends it to his friends that need gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Holinger

product_meta.title: Le Veneziane Gluten Free Pasta Variety Pack(1 Each)
product_meta.description: This product, made from 100% pre-cooked corn flour, is processed and packaged in a modern factory in Vedelago, Italy. It is characterized by the absence of gluten, high digestibility, low fat content and no dyes. The color is characteristic of B-carotene present in the raw material.
feature_bullets: Gluten Free, wheat free Corn pasta Highly Digestible, Low Fat Content
